configurations.name: Try ConsoleBox
configurations.command: rm -rf ConsoleBox;dotnet new consolebox -vs -n ConsoleBox;cd ConsoleBox/src;dotnet run --project ConsoleBox

configurations.name: Try ConsoleBox with WebApiPrj
configurations.command: rm -rf ConsoleBox;dotnet new consolebox -vs -n ConsoleBox;cd ConsoleBox/src;dotnet new webapiprj -n WebApiBox -vs --path src;cd ..;dotnet run --project src/ConsoleBox

configurations.name: Try WebApiBox
configurations.command: rm -rf WebApiBox;dotnet new webapibox -n WebApiBox -vs;cd WebApiBox/src;dotnet run WebApiBox --project WebApiBox

configurations.name: Try WebApiBox with ConsolePrj
configurations.command: rm -rf WebApiBox;dotnet new webapibox -n WebApiBox -vs;cd WebApiBox/src;dotnet new consoleprj -n ConsoleBox -vs --path src; cd ..;dotnet run WebApiBox --project src/WebApiBox

configurations.name: Try ServiceBox
configurations.command: rm -rf ConsoleBox;dotnet new consoleprj -n ConsoleBox;cd ConsoleBox;dotnet new servicebox -n MyService --nameSpace ConsoleBox; dotnet run

configurations.name: Try ConsolePrj
configurations.command: rm -rf ConsoleBox;dotnet new consoleprj -vs --path src -n ConsoleBox;cd ConsoleBox;dotnet run

configurations.name: Try WebApiPrj
configurations.command: rm -rf WebApiBox;dotnet new webapiprj -n WebApiBox -vs;cd WebApiBox;dotnet run
